causes. If it is thought that a 
post-mortem could be helpful, 
a senior doctor or midwife 
will discuss this with you and 
explain	the	possible	benefits.
If you decide to have a full or 
partial post-mortem, you will 
be asked to sign a consent 
form. When the post-mortem 
report is available, you will be 
offered	an	appointment	with	
a consultant who can explain 
the results to you and also 
what these might mean for a 
future pregnancy.
